question:
Which of the following is/are function/functions of Security Exchange Board of India (SEBI)?
  1. Regulation of money market
  2. Regulation of capital market
  3. Regulation of commodity future market
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: The Forward Markets Commission (FMC) was the chief regulator of commodity futures markets. But it has been merged with SEBI in 2015. Regulation of money market in India is carried by RBI. So the correct answer is 2 & 3
